performSwap(address,address,address).notice: PERFORM A SIMPLE SWAP WITHOUT ROUTER EXERCISE  The contract has an initial balance of 1 WETH.  The challenge is to swap any amount of WETH for USDC token using the `swap` function  from USDC/WETH pool.
